messages.message:
> • Extracting a single data point where you need to provide more context: an example is captured in Taxdown video. What’s our guidance on what users should do this such cases? @Sławek Biel
The complex prompt does sound like the simplest solution for that. If we wanted to solve it with extraction prompts we would need a way for a user to provide a more detailed description on  the field they want to extract. But that increases complexity on both the UI and model side
